## attr() function

Decorator: Specifies an HTML attribute.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function attr(target: {}, prop: string): void;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

target


</td><td>

{}


</td><td>

The class to define the attribute on.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td><td>

string


</td><td>
